name: Siesta Dog
description:
Good dogs help you get a solid hour of siesta in without any annoying distractions.

Play as a good dog, tackling everything in your room that could disturb your wonderful hour of afternoon solace.

~ Controls ~

  • arrow keys - move around the room
  • z/x - interact (although- not everything in a bedroom is designed for dogs to use...)
  • when you're ready, interact with the dog bed to get some well earned rest!
